mapper.insert: INSERT INTO repository_post (title, content, employee_no, file_repository_id, write_date) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{employeeNo}, #{fileRepositoryId}, NOW());
mapper.select: SELECT file_repository_id, repository_name FROM repository WHERE suber_no = #{suberNo} AND repository_type = '전체';
SELECT file_repository_id, repository_name FROM repository WHERE suber_no = #{suberNo} AND department_no = #{departmentNo} AND repository_type = '부서';
SELECT file_repository_id, repository_name FROM repository WHERE suber_no = #{suberNo} AND employee_no = #{employeeNo} AND repository_type = '개인';

SELECT p.title, NVL(f.save_file_name, '파일 없음') AS fileName, e.employee_name AS writer, p.creation_date FROM repository_post p JOIN employees e ON p.employee_no = e.employee_no LEFT JOIN repository_file f ON p.writing_id = f.writing_id WHERE p.file_repository_id = #{fileRepositoryId} ORDER BY p.creation_date DESC
